articles.content: London: A purple bacteria -- which store energy from light -- can help harvest hydrogen fuel from sewage, and recover carbon from any type of organic waste, scientists have found. Organic compounds i… [+2692 chars]

articles.title: Watch live Saturday! Rocket Lab and SpaceX host predawn launch double header - Space.com
articles.description: Rocket Lab launches at 1:12 a.m. EDT (0512 GMT). SpaceX at 5:21 a.m. EDT (0921 GMT).
